page.title: 17Calderstones - the Future.
page.content: The Hospital Plan of 1962 has seen a complete change in the attitude towards the care of the mentally handicapped.The large{institutions}are being replaced by{community homes}and this policy has seen a{decrease}in the number of residents at Calderstones. Calderstones is presently 3 years into a 10 year plan which foresees the housing of its residents back in the community and the hospital's eventual {closure. {Lack of finance,}particularly in the provision of suitable community homes is holding up progress and it is generally thought that the{plan}will have to be{extended. {Opposition}to the closure has been voiced in many quarters-one fact still remains,the{closure}of the hospital will have an effect on the{local {community}-how much is to be seen!
